title: HDFC Bank taps retail bankers as wealth managers amid talent crunch
description: HDFC Bank is tackling a talent shortage in its wealth management sector by recruiting retail bankers from within and outside the organization. The bank's wealth team, which grows by up to 20% annually, manages wealthy clients in numerous cities. However, expanding in smaller towns is difficult due to a shortage of both high-net-worth individuals and qualified professionals.
